Newbie Guide:
Time for a new mission.
After swapping the Weapon Exchange Ticket you received with the Non-Grade Shadow Weapon, go and visit Zerstorer Marcela at the South Gate of Kamael Village and defeat the monsters on Golden Hill. You can meet Zerstorer Marcela if you follow the arrow. I'll tell you more later.
Do you need help with anything else?
Ask for advice regarding
NPC location information
Receive a blessing of protection
Teleport to the starting village of another race.
Check the list of available supplement magic
Get help with a Newbie item.
